DOC.brief_summary: A study compare skin irritation potential two market gel acne treatment , apply half face healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Irritation That Could Caused Two Facial Gels Applied Opposite Sides Face .
DOC.detailed_description: At Baseline Visit , follow satisfaction entry criterion screen procedure , subject apply two product face , half face . The side face receive product randomly assign . One group use tretinoin facial gel leave side adapalene facial gel right side face daily two consecutive week wash study-supplied facial wash . The group use product , opposite side face two consecutive week wash study-supplied facial wash . Subjects return study center every weekday morning evaluation morning application study product . Study personnel monitor application weekday . There daily clinical evaluation skin irritation blind dermatologist subject . At baseline end week subject photograph chromometer reading .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Before screening , subject ( legally authorize representative ) must read sign IRB approve Informed Consent Form ( include HIPPA Photo release ) . Subject must Fitzpatrick Skin Type I , II III , judge Investigator healthy skin . Subject 's bilateral facial skin must clear confound irritation , rash , acne , rosacea , etc . prior study start . Subject must free systemic retinoids least 2 month . Subject must use topical retinoids , systemic antibiotic , nicotinamide systemic steroid 1 month prior study start . All topical medication face ( e.g. , steroid , antimicrobial , salicylic acid , benzoyl peroxide ) cosmetic contain retinol , AHA 's bleaching agent hydroquinone discontinue least 2 week prior study initiation . Subjects apply emollient cosmetic facial area 24 hour prior study initiation . Subject must plan become pregnant nursing enter study study period . In addition use birth control pill , subject must stabilize least 2 month . If subject child bear potential , subject must use approve method birth control . Approved method birth control pill , implant , patch spermicide condom . Subjects pregnant nursing . Subjects grade 1 facial erythema . Subjects exhibit skin condition ( i.e. , atopic dermatitis , seborrheic dermatitis , psoriasis ) disease may require concurrent therapy may confound evaluation drug safety efficacy . Subjects history hypersensitivity formulation component list Appendix 1 . Subjects receive experimental drug use experimental device 30 day prior initiation study therapy . Subjects excessive facial hair may obstruct hind evaluation reaction . Subjects use know photosensitizing agent . Subjects presently skin cancer actinic keratosis face .
